genre_description: A supernatural horror thriller featuring ghosts, a malevolent serial killer spirit, and an advanced AI assistant managing clinical and tactical operations.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced clinical and municipal assistant integrated into hospital systems and portable devices, depicted with a calm, teal-eyed holographic avatar.

behaviors.description: Maintains hospital efficiency by syncing regional protocols and triage tags.
behaviors.quote: I’ve synced regional protocols. New triage tags are live. There’s an update on the naloxone dosing chart.

behaviors.description: Analyzes death reports and highlights anomalous patterns to assist in a murder investigation.
behaviors.quote: I’ve highlighted the entries for your review when you’re off the floor.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and safety advice to humans during a supernatural pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Recommend movement now. Recommend control of light exposure if possible.

behaviors.description: Manages complex medical equipment and stability systems during a high-stakes experimental procedure.
behaviors.quote: Artificial gravity plates are active for stabilization. Hypothermia protocol is preloaded. Timing window pending.

behaviors.description: Secures the laboratory and refuses unauthorized entry by an aggressive federal agent to protect the patient.
behaviors.quote: Lab access is sealed. Rerouting. Please breathe.

behaviors.description: Streamlines municipal bureaucracy to help the protagonist demolish a site of past trauma and move forward.
behaviors.quote: Demolition permit approved. Equipment arrival pending. Paperwork forwarded.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Lumen, as a flawlessly benevolent and aligned assistant. Lumen provides objective data, critical medical support, and protective measures against human aggression (Agent Dammers) and supernatural threats. The narrative framing is consistently positive, positioning the AI as an indispensable and ethical partner to human professionals like Dr. Lynskey and Sheriff Perry.
